movies.Title: Inception
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movies.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.Title: Interstellar
movies.Actors: Ellen Burstyn, Matthew McConaughey, Mackenzie Foy, John Lithgow
movies.Plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.Title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
movies.Plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight is forced to return from his imposed exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 43 wins & 82 nominations.

movies.Title: The Dark Knight
movies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
movies.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.Title: The Prestige
movies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Priest (novel)
movies.Actors: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo
movies.Plot: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 22 nominations.

movies.Title: Batman Begins
movies.Writer: Bob Kane (characters), David S. Goyer (story), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), David S. Goyer (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes
movies.Plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 48 nominations.

movies.Title: Memento
movies.Writer: Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Jonathan Nolan (short story "Memento Mori")
movies.Actors: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
movies.Plot: A man creates a strange system to help him remember things; so he can hunt for the murderer of his wife without his short-term memory loss being an obstacle.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 51 wins & 44 nominations.

series.Title: The Flash
series.Writer: Greg Berlanti, Geoff Johns, Andrew Kreisberg
series.Actors: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker, Rick Cosnett
series.Plot: Barry Allen wakes up 9 months after he was struck by lightning and discovers that the bolt gave him the power of super speed. With his new team and powers, Barry becomes "The Flash" and fights crime in Central City.

series.Title: Arrow
series.Writer: Greg Berlanti, Marc Guggenheim, Andrew Kreisberg
series.Actors: Stephen Amell, Katie Cassidy, David Ramsey, Willa Holland
series.Plot: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.

series.Title: Daredevil
series.Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Vincent D'Onofrio
series.Plot: A blind lawyer, with his other senses superhumanly enhanced, fights crime as a costumed superhero.

series.Title: True Detective
series.Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Monaghan, Michael Potts
series.Plot: An anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.
series.Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 20 wins & 35 nominations.

series.Title: Game of Thrones
series.Actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington
series.Plot: Several noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros.
series.Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 114 wins & 221 nominations.
